subteams.name: Mechanical
subteams.description: Builds the frame of the robot and design all the moving parts. Has 4 subteams.

subteams.name: CAD
subteams.description: Allows the team to visualize ideas in 3D which is useful for prototyping. Using Fusion 360 & Machine parts using in-house CNC machine.

subteams.name: Programming
subteams.description: Makes robot active through programming in C++.

subteams.name: Business and Outreach
subteams.description: Markets and advertises the team. Manages sponsorships and team finances.

subteams.name: Electrical
subteams.description: Focuses on wiring the robot and organizing components.
